title: Shibli denies rumours about Usman Buzdar’s departure
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 16 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz on Thursday denied
rumours about departure of Punjab Chief Minister Usman Buzdar.
In a tweet the minister said: ” Chief Minister Punjab, Usman Buzdar is going nowhere.
All speculations regarding his departure are mala fide and baseless.”
